title: IMAP server error
creator: relec49731
content:
I'm using the Thunderbird email client to connect to a few of my Zoho emails. This has worked perfectly well before.

It has stopped syncing emails since yesterday. When I try to reconnect the account I get an error like this:

readStringUntil(): end of stream reached. Read: "" while waiting for

Is there an active issue with this? Anything I can do to fix?

Thanks !
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: BUG: No Files attach, only Media picker
creator: ml35
content:
I can go to any File Manager and send a file to TB, but from within TB itself regardless of composing new or replying, I can only attach Media, as the app only invokes the Media picker when tapping the Paper Clip icon.

Android 14, latest TB from Play Store.

title: adresboek auto-aanvullen e-mailadres
creator: ps011
content: Waar is adresboek in Thunderbird mobile? Adres van ontvanger wordt niet automatisch aangevuld.

title: Why latest releases are treatet as pseudo-releases in Obtainium
creator: piscler
content:
Hi All,

I am installing Thunderbird from official GitHub releases and I am wondering why I am getting info from Obtainium that thunderbird-14.0 is something called "pseudo-release".

Can someone explain me this term regarding GitHub apk files? Is it OK to install it?

Regards, Timo
